channel.title: Cliff Helicopter battle crash / glitches
channel.description: Hey all, wonderful game, enjoyed it very much thus far. Originally when fighting the Apache Helicopter on the cliff I wasn't able to destroy it. I went back into the room where I found the rocket launcher in search of more rockets. When I left the room back to the cliff side the helicopter would be shooting randomly and nowhere near me. It was moving/behaving strangely. I have retried several times and now the game just crashes on me. HL2.exe stopped responding with the error information below. I have also attached the minidump file. Problem signature: Problem Event Name: APPCRASH Application Name: hl2.exe Application Version: 0.0.0.0 Application Timestamp: 470c11ae Fault Module Name: client.dll Fault Module Version: 0.0.0.0 Fault Module Timestamp: 504ecc4f Exception Code: c0000005 Exception Offset: 00362edd OS Version: 6.1.7601.2.1.0.256.1 Locale ID: 4105 Additional Information 1: 0a9e Additional Information 2: 0a9e372d3b4ad19135b953a78882e789 Additional Information 3: 0a9e Additional Information 4: 0a9e372d3b4ad19135b953a78882e789 Thanks! item.title: Cliff Helicopter battle crash / glitches
item.dc:creator: BendyBread
item.description:
I THINK I’ve had that issue (or something similar).

The fight was going normally as it should. I ran out of rockets and so I fled to the rocket crate to get some more. Once I ran back to my original hiding place, the Apache was at a right angle from me, and attacking the mountainside.
I was able to run out into the open and just blow it up uninterrupted, but it did kill the immersion a bit (or maybe that was the fact it was my 15th retry…).
